article_title: Mississippi County Hospitals Expect To See Tax Revenue
article_text: Ralph Beaty, the CEO of the Mississippi County Hospital System, already has a list of projects to fund with the money generated from the 0.5 percent countywide sales tax that voters approved in October.

article_metadata.keywords: Little Rock, Business Journal, Business news

og.description: Ralph Beaty, the CEO of the Mississippi County Hospital System, already has a list of projects to fund with the money generated from the 0.5 percent countywide sales tax that voters approved in October.
